attributes.action: put the human rights of people before the 'rights' of animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With recent anti terrorist laws introduced in 2005, restricting the right to peaceful protest on such important and major issues as poverty and Iraq. However, animal rights protesters go ahead with violent actions unhindered, for example Oxford University in 2006 where builders working on a science lab were threatened with their life.
